author: veithen
msg: Mail transport: Make sure that non textual attachements are sent with base64 transfer encoding instead of binary. This fix uses the extension introduced in WSCOMMONS-390.

author: lacton
msg: 'deploy' task has been renamed to 'upload' for version 1.2.0

author: veithen
msg: WSCOMMONS-390: Correctly propagate the OMOutputFormat object in MIMEOutputUtils.writeDataHandlerWithAttachmentsMessage so that USE_CTE_BASE64_FOR_NON_TEXTUAL_ATTACHMENTS can be used with SOAPMessageFormatter.

msg: Experiment with bundling Continuum and Tomcat
